definition: Later Zhao of the Sixteen Kingdoms (319-350)
back/behind/rear/afterwards/after/later/post-
surname Zhao/one of the seven states during the Warring States Period (476-220 BC)/the Former Zhao 前趙 (304-329) and Later Zhao 後趙 (319-350), states of the Sixteen Kingdoms
to surpass (old)

sentences.english: Then, Zhao Gao took this opportunity to ask the court, "Is this a deer or a horse?""
sentences.chinese: 然後趙高藉機問各位大臣，“這是鹿還是馬？”

sentences.english: The most powerful was the Later Zhao of the Shi family which was Jie(white huns) in ethnicity.
sentences.chinese: 最厲害的是後趙，石家政權，白種人匈奴血緣。

sentences.english: In 1967, Zhao Wenliang moved to Shichahai.
